entry.title: 数学随笔
entry.content:
数学随笔

极限

question 1： 极限定义

f(x)f(x)f(x)在x0x_{0}x0​处的极限为CCC的定义为：∀ε>0\forall \varepsilon >0∀ε>0,∃δ>0\exists \delta >0∃δ>0,只要∣x−x0∣<δ\left | x-x_{0} \right | <\delta∣x−x0​∣<δ,就有∣f(x)−C∣<ε\left | f(x)-C \right |<\varepsilon∣f(x)−C∣<ε

上述就是我们所熟悉的极限的定义。

但是倘若我们把∃δ>0\exists \delta >0∃δ>0变成∃δ≥0\exists \delta \ge 0∃δ≥0会有什么问题呢？

直观的想，并不会有任何的xxx满足∣x−x0∣<0\left | x-x_{0} \right | <0∣x−x0​∣<0,但这会导致什么问题呢？会导致无法存在极限了吗？

接下来，我们从集合的角度进行剖析

首先，我们要明白这句话是在表达什么样的关系。

我们定义里面的:只要∣x−x0∣<0\left | x-x_{0} \right | <0∣x−x0​∣<0,就有∣f(x)−C∣<ε\left | f(x)-C \right |<\varepsilon∣f(x)−C∣<ε

所表达的其实就是在说:{x∣∣x−x0∣<0}\left \{ x|\left | x-x_{0} \right | <0\right \}{x∣∣x−x0​∣<0}是{x∣∣f(x)−C∣<ε}\{x|\left | f(x)-C \right |<\varepsilon\}{x∣∣f(x)−C∣<ε}的子集。

也就是说，前面的集合如果是后面集合的子集的话，我们就可以说f(x)f(x)f(x)在逼近x0x_{0}x0​的时候的极限为CCC。

那么我们可以就可以得到清晰的结论了，既然并不会有任何的xxx满足∣x−x0∣<0\left | x-x_{0} \right | <0∣x−x0​∣<0,那么{x∣∣x−x0∣<0}\left \{ x|\left | x-x_{0} \right | <0\right \}{x∣∣x−x0​∣<0}就是一个空集

理所当然可以得到,{x∣∣x−x0∣<0}\left \{ x|\left | x-x_{0} \right | <0\right \}{x∣∣x−x0​∣<0}将会永远都是{x∣∣f(x)−C∣<ε}\{x|\left | f(x)-C \right |<\varepsilon\}{x∣∣f(x)−C∣<ε}的子集，无论说CCC是多少。也就是说对于任何一个CCC我们找到了这么一个δ=0\delta=0δ=0,满足了我们修改后的极限定义。

即：任何的CCC都是我们的极限。

entry.title: 从纳维-斯托克斯方程到伯努利方程
entry.content:
从纳维-斯托克斯方程到伯努利方程

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=ρgj−∂p∂xj+∂∂xi[2μ(∂uj∂xi)+(μv−23μ)δij∂um∂xm]\frac{\partial (\rho u_j)}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial}{\partial x_i}(\rho u_i u_j) = \rho g_j - \frac{\partial p}{\partial x_j} + \frac{\partial}{\partial x_i}[2\mu(\frac{\partial u_j}{\partial x_i}) + (\mu_v - \frac{2}{3}\mu)\delta_{ij}\frac{\partial u_m}{\partial x_m}]∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=ρgj​−∂xj​∂p​+∂xi​∂​[2μ(∂xi​∂uj​​)+(μv​−32​μ)δij​∂xm​∂um​​]

若粘度系数为常数(可以把μ\muμ提取出来)：

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=−∂p∂xj+ρgj+μ∂∂xi∂uj∂xi+(μv+13μ)∂∂xj(∂um∂xm)\frac{\partial (\rho u_j)}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial}{\partial x_i}(\rho u_i u_j) = - \frac{\partial p}{\partial x_j}+\rho g_j + \mu \frac{\partial }{\partial x_i} \frac{\partial u_j}{\partial x_i} + (\mu_v + \frac{1}{3}\mu)\frac{\partial}{\partial x_j}(\frac{\partial u_m}{\partial x_m})∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=−∂xj​∂p​+ρgj​+μ∂xi​∂​∂xi​∂uj​​+(μv​+31​μ)∂xj​∂​(∂xm​∂um​​)

若为不可压缩流动,∂um∂xm=0\frac{\partial u_{m}}{\partial x_{m}}=0∂xm​∂um​​=0:

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=−∂p∂xj+ρgj+μ∂∂xi∂uj∂xi\frac{\partial (\rho u_j)}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial}{\partial x_i}(\rho u_i u_j) = - \frac{\partial p}{\partial x_j}+\rho g_j + \mu \frac{\partial }{\partial x_i} \frac{\partial u_j}{\partial x_i}∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=−∂xj​∂p​+ρgj​+μ∂xi​∂​∂xi​∂uj​​

如果是没有粘性:

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=−∂p∂xj+ρgj\frac{\partial (\rho u_j)}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial}{\partial x_i}(\rho u_i u_j) = - \frac{\partial p}{\partial x_j}+\rho g_j∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=−∂xj​∂p​+ρgj​

即:

ρ∂u∂t+ρ(u⋅∇)u=−∇p+ρg\rho \frac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + \rho (\mathbf{u} \cdot \nabla) \mathbf{u} = -\nabla p + \rho \mathbf{g}ρ∂t∂u​+ρ(u⋅∇)u=−∇p+ρg

再根据

(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗=∇(v22)−v⃗×(∇×v⃗)(\vec{v} \cdot \nabla)\vec{v} = \nabla\left(\frac{v^2}{2}\right) - \vec{v} \times (\nabla \times \vec{v})(v⋅∇)v=∇(2v2​)−v×(∇×v)

有

ρ∂u∂t+∇(u22)−u⃗×(∇×u⃗)=−∇p+ρgρ∂u∂t+∇(u22)+(∇×u⃗)×u⃗=−∇p+ρgρ∂u∂t+∇(u22)+ω×u⃗=−∇p+ρg\begin{aligned}\rho \frac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + \nabla\left(\frac{u^2}{2}\right) - \vec{u} \times (\nabla \times \vec{u}) &= -\nabla p + \rho \mathbf{g}\\\rho \frac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + \nabla\left(\frac{u^2}{2}\right) + (\nabla \times \vec{u}) \times \vec{u} &= -\nabla p + \rho \mathbf{g}\\\rho \frac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + \nabla\left(\frac{u^2}{2}\right) + \omega \times \vec{u} &= -\nabla p + \rho \mathbf{g}\end{aligned}ρ∂t∂u​+∇(2u2​)−u×(∇×u)ρ∂t∂u​+∇(2u2​)+(∇×u)×uρ∂t∂u​+∇(2u2​)+ω×u​=−∇p+ρg=−∇p+ρg=−∇p+ρg​

若体力为有势力

g=−∇ΦΦ=gz\mathbf{g}=- \nabla \Phi \qquad \Phi=gzg=−∇ΦΦ=gz

若为正压流体:

 Barotropic dr⋅1ρ∇p=dpρ=d∫dpρ=dr⋅∇∫dpρ,1ρ∇p=∇∫dpρ∂u∂t+∇(∣u∣22+∫dpρ+gz)=u×ω\begin{array}{cc}\text { Barotropic } & d \mathbf{r} \cdot \frac{1}{\rho} \nabla p=\frac{d p}{\rho}=d \int \frac{d p}{\rho}=d \mathbf{r} \cdot \nabla \int \frac{d p}{\rho}, \frac{1}{\rho} \nabla p=\nabla \int \frac{d p}{\rho} \\& \frac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t}+\nabla\left(\frac{|\mathbf{u}|^{2}}{2}+\int \frac{d p}{\rho}+g z\right)=\mathbf{u} \times \boldsymbol{\omega}\end{array} Barotropic ​dr⋅ρ1​∇p=ρdp​=d∫ρdp​=dr⋅∇∫ρdp​,ρ1​∇p=∇∫ρdp​∂t∂u​+∇(2∣u∣2​+∫ρdp​+gz)=u×ω​

上述推导所用矢量恒等式:

dr⋅∇v=dvd \mathbf{r} \cdot \nabla v=dvdr⋅∇v=dv

entry.title: 向量恒等式与推导
entry.content:
向量恒等式与推导

公式

公式一

∇(A⃗⋅B⃗)=A⃗×(∇×B⃗)+(A⃗⋅∇)B⃗+B⃗×(∇×A⃗)+(B⃗⋅∇)A⃗ abla(\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}) = \vec{A} imes ( abla imes \vec{B}) + (\vec{A} \cdot abla)\vec{B} + \vec{B} imes ( abla imes \vec{A}) + (\vec{B} \cdot abla)\vec{A}∇(A⋅B)=A×(∇×B)+(A⋅∇)B+B×(∇×A)+(B⋅∇)A

公式二

∇(v⃗⋅v⃗)=2(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗+2v⃗×(∇×v⃗) abla(\vec{v} \cdot \vec{v}) = 2(\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} + 2\vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v})∇(v⋅v)=2(v⋅∇)v+2v×(∇×v)

公式三

(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗=∇(v22)−v⃗×(∇×v⃗)(\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} = abla\left( rac{v^2}{2} ight) - \vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v})(v⋅∇)v=∇(2v2​)−v×(∇×v)

推导过程

第一个公式的推导

这是向量恒等式中的梯度乘积规则。我们可以从分量表示开始推导：

假设 A⃗=(Ax,Ay,Az)\vec{A} = (A_x, A_y, A_z)A=(Ax​,Ay​,Az​) 和 B⃗=(Bx,By,Bz)\vec{B} = (B_x, B_y, B_z)B=(Bx​,By​,Bz​)，那么：

A⃗⋅B⃗=AxBx+AyBy+AzBz\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B} = A_xB_x + A_yB_y + A_zB_zA⋅B=Ax​Bx​+Ay​By​+Az​Bz​

对这个标量函数求梯度：

∇(A⃗⋅B⃗)=(∂∂x,∂∂y,∂∂z)(AxBx+AyBy+AzBz) abla(\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B}) = \left( rac{\partial}{\partial x}, rac{\partial}{\partial y}, rac{\partial}{\partial z} ight)(A_xB_x + A_yB_y + A_zB_z)∇(A⋅B)=(∂x∂​,∂y∂​,∂z∂​)(Ax​Bx​+Ay​By​+Az​Bz​)

=(Ax∂Bx∂x+Bx∂Ax∂x+Ay∂By∂x+By∂Ay∂x+Az∂Bz∂x+Bz∂Az∂x,Ax∂Bx∂y+Bx∂Ax∂y+Ay∂By∂y+By∂Ay∂y+Az∂Bz∂y+Bz∂Az∂y,Ax∂Bx∂z+Bx∂Ax∂z+Ay∂By∂z+By∂Ay∂z+Az∂Bz∂z+Bz∂Az∂z)=(A_x rac{\partial B_x}{\partial x}+B_x rac{\partial A_x}{\partial x}+A_y rac{\partial B_y}{\partial x}+B_y rac{\partial A_y}{\partial x}+A_z rac{\partial B_z}{\partial x}+B_z rac{\partial A_z}{\partial x},\\quad A_x rac{\partial B_x}{\partial y}+B_x rac{\partial A_x}{\partial y}+A_y rac{\partial B_y}{\partial y}+B_y rac{\partial A_y}{\partial y}+A_z rac{\partial B_z}{\partial y}+B_z rac{\partial A_z}{\partial y},\\quadA_x rac{\partial B_x}{\partial z}+B_x rac{\partial A_x}{\partial z}+A_y rac{\partial B_y}{\partial z}+B_y rac{\partial A_y}{\partial z}+A_z rac{\partial B_z}{\partial z}+B_z rac{\partial A_z}{\partial z})\=(Ax​∂x∂Bx​​+Bx​∂x∂Ax​​+Ay​∂x∂By​​+By​∂x∂Ay​​+Az​∂x∂Bz​​+Bz​∂x∂Az​​,Ax​∂y∂Bx​​+Bx​∂y∂Ax​​+Ay​∂y∂By​​+By​∂y∂Ay​​+Az​∂y∂Bz​​+Bz​∂y∂Az​​,Ax​∂z∂Bx​​+Bx​∂z∂Ax​​+Ay​∂z∂By​​+By​∂z∂Ay​​+Az​∂z∂Bz​​+Bz​∂z∂Az​​)

在三维空间中，假设向量 a 和 b 的分量表示为：a=(ax,ay,az) 或 a=axi^+ayj^+azk^b=(bx,by,bz) 或 b=bxi^+byj^+bzk^梯度算子 ∇ 的表达式为：∇=∂∂xi^+∂∂yj^+∂∂zk^首先计算 b⋅∇：b⋅∇=bx∂∂x+by∂∂y+bz∂∂z ext{在三维空间中，假设向量}~a~ ext{和}~b~ ext{的分量表示为：}\a = (a_x, a_y, a_z)~ ext{或}~a = a_x\hat{i} + a_y\hat{j} + a_z\hat{k}\b = (b_x, b_y, b_z)~ ext{或}~b = b_x\hat{i} + b_y\hat{j} + b_z\hat{k}\ ext{梯度算子}~ abla~ ext{的表达式为：}\ abla = rac{\partial}{\partial x}\hat{i} + rac{\partial}{\partial y}\hat{j} + rac{\partial}{\partial z}\hat{k}\ ext{首先计算}~b \cdot abla：\b \cdot abla = b_x rac{\partial}{\partial x} + b_y rac{\partial}{\partial y} + b_z rac{\partial}{\partial z}\在三维空间中，假设向量 a 和 b 的分量表示为：a=(ax​,ay​,az​) 或 a=ax​i^+ay​j^​+az​k^b=(bx​,by​,bz​) 或 b=bx​i^+by​j^​+bz​k^梯度算子 ∇ 的表达式为：∇=∂x∂​i^+∂y∂​j^​+∂z∂​k^首先计算 b⋅∇：b⋅∇=bx​∂x∂​+by​∂y∂​+bz​∂z∂​

然后，我们将这个标量微分算子作用于向量 a：(b⋅∇)a=(b⋅∇)(axi^+ayj^+azk^)(b⋅∇)a=(bx∂∂x+by∂∂y+bz∂∂z)(axi^+ayj^+azk^)分配律展开：(b⋅∇)a=(bx∂ax∂x+by∂ax∂y+bz∂ax∂z)i^+(bx∂ay∂x+by∂ay∂y+bz∂ay∂z)j^+(bx∂az∂x+by∂az∂y+bz∂az∂z)k^ egin{aligned}& ext{然后，我们将这个标量微分算子作用于向量}~a：\(b \cdot abla)a &= (b \cdot abla)(a_x\hat{i} + a_y\hat{j} + a_z\hat{k})\(b \cdot abla)a &= \left(b_x rac{\partial}{\partial x} + b_y rac{\partial}{\partial y} + b_z rac{\partial}{\partial z} ight)(a_x\hat{i} + a_y\hat{j} + a_z\hat{k})\ ext{分配律展开：}\(b \cdot abla)a &= \left(b_x rac{\partial a_x}{\partial x} + b_y rac{\partial a_x}{\partial y} + b_z rac{\partial a_x}{\partial z} ight)\hat{i} + \left(b_x rac{\partial a_y}{\partial x} + b_y rac{\partial a_y}{\partial y} + b_z rac{\partial a_y}{\partial z} ight)\hat{j} + \left(b_x rac{\partial a_z}{\partial x} + b_y rac{\partial a_z}{\partial y} + b_z rac{\partial a_z}{\partial z} ight)\hat{k}\\end{aligned}(b⋅∇)a(b⋅∇)a分配律展开：(b⋅∇)a​然后，我们将这个标量微分算子作用于向量 a：=(b⋅∇)(ax​i^+ay​j^​+az​k^)=(bx​∂x∂​+by​∂y∂​+bz​∂z∂​)(ax​i^+ay​j^​+az​k^)=(bx​∂x∂ax​​+by​∂y∂ax​​+bz​∂z∂ax​​)i^+(bx​∂x∂ay​​+by​∂y∂ay​​+bz​∂z∂ay​​)j^​+(bx​∂x∂az​​+by​∂y∂az​​+bz​∂z∂az​​)k^​

在三维空间中，假设向量 a 和 b 的分量表示为：a=(ax,ay,az) 或 a=axi^+ayj^+azk^b=(bx,by,bz) 或 b=bxi^+byj^+bzk^ ext{在三维空间中，假设向量} ~a~ ext{和}~b~ ext{的分量表示为：}\a = (a_x, a_y, a_z)~ ext{或}~a = a_x\hat{i} + a_y\hat{j} + a_z\hat{k}\b = (b_x, b_y, b_z)~ ext{或}~b = b_x\hat{i} + b_y\hat{j} + b_z\hat{k}在三维空间中，假设向量 a 和 b 的分量表示为：a=(ax​,ay​,az​) 或 a=ax​i^+ay​j^​+az​k^b=(bx​,by​,bz​) 或 b=bx​i^+by​j^​+bz​k^

梯度算子 ∇ 的表达式为：∇=∂∂xi^+∂∂yj^+∂∂zk^首先计算 a⋅∇：a⋅∇=ax∂∂x+ay∂∂y+az∂∂z ext{梯度算子}~ abla~ ext{的表达式为：}\ abla = rac{\partial}{\partial x}\hat{i} + rac{\partial}{\partial y}\hat{j} + rac{\partial}{\partial z}\hat{k}\ ext{首先计算}~a \cdot abla：\a \cdot abla = a_x rac{\partial}{\partial x} + a_y rac{\partial}{\partial y} + a_z rac{\partial}{\partial z}梯度算子 ∇ 的表达式为：∇=∂x∂​i^+∂y∂​j^​+∂z∂​k^首先计算 a⋅∇：a⋅∇=ax​∂x∂​+ay​∂y∂​+az​∂z∂​

然后，我们将这个标量微分算子作用于向量 b：(a⋅∇)b=(a⋅∇)(bxi^+byj^+bzk^)(a⋅∇)b=(ax∂∂x+ay∂∂y+az∂∂z)(bxi^+byj^+bzk^)分配律展开：(a⋅∇)b=(ax∂bx∂x+ay∂bx∂y+az∂bx∂z)i^+(ax∂by∂x+ay∂by∂y+az∂by∂z)j^+(ax∂bz∂x+ay∂bz∂y+az∂bz∂z)k^ egin{aligned}& ext{然后，我们将这个标量微分算子作用于向量}~b：\(a \cdot abla)b &= (a \cdot abla)(b_x\hat{i} + b_y\hat{j} + b_z\hat{k})\(a \cdot abla)b &= \left(a_x rac{\partial}{\partial x} + a_y rac{\partial}{\partial y} + a_z rac{\partial}{\partial z} ight)(b_x\hat{i} + b_y\hat{j} + b_z\hat{k})\ ext{分配律展开：}\(a \cdot abla)b &= \left(a_x rac{\partial b_x}{\partial x} + a_y rac{\partial b_x}{\partial y} + a_z rac{\partial b_x}{\partial z} ight)\hat{i} + \left(a_x rac{\partial b_y}{\partial x} + a_y rac{\partial b_y}{\partial y} + a_z rac{\partial b_y}{\partial z} ight)\hat{j} + \left(a_x rac{\partial b_z}{\partial x} + a_y rac{\partial b_z}{\partial y} + a_z rac{\partial b_z}{\partial z} ight)\hat{k}\end{aligned}(a⋅∇)b(a⋅∇)b分配律展开：(a⋅∇)b​然后，我们将这个标量微分算子作用于向量 b：=(a⋅∇)(bx​i^+by​j^​+bz​k^)=(ax​∂x∂​+ay​∂y∂​+az​∂z∂​)(bx​i^+by​j^​+bz​k^)=(ax​∂x∂bx​​+ay​∂y∂bx​​+az​∂z∂bx​​)i^+(ax​∂x∂by​​+ay​∂y∂by​​+az​∂z∂by​​)j^​+(ax​∂x∂bz​​+ay​∂y∂bz​​+az​∂z∂bz​​)k^​

∇×a⃗=(∂az∂y−∂ay∂z)i^+(∂ax∂z−∂az∂x)j^+(∂ay∂x−∂ax∂y)k^∇×b⃗=(∂bz∂y−∂by∂z)i^+(∂bx∂z−∂bz∂x)j^+(∂by∂x−∂bx∂y)k^ abla imes \vec{a} = \left( rac{\partial a_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial a_y}{\partial z} ight) \hat{i} + \left( rac{\partial a_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial a_z}{\partial x} ight) \hat{j} + \left( rac{\partial a_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial a_x}{\partial y} ight) \hat{k}\ abla imes \vec{b} = \left( rac{\partial b_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial b_y}{\partial z} ight) \hat{i} + \left( rac{\partial b_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial b_z}{\partial x} ight) \hat{j} + \left( rac{\partial b_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial b_x}{\partial y} ight) \hat{k}∇×a=(∂y∂az​​−∂z∂ay​​)i^+(∂z∂ax​​−∂x∂az​​)j^​+(∂x∂ay​​−∂y∂ax​​)k^∇×b=(∂y∂bz​​−∂z∂by​​)i^+(∂z∂bx​​−∂x∂bz​​)j^​+(∂x∂by​​−∂y∂bx​​)k^

b⃗×(∇×a⃗)=∣i^j^k^bxbybz∂az∂y−∂ay∂z∂ax∂z−∂az∂x∂ay∂x−∂ax∂y∣b⃗×(∇×a⃗)=[by(∂ay∂x−∂ax∂y)−bz(∂ax∂z−∂az∂x)]i^+[bz(∂az∂y−∂ay∂z)−bx(∂ay∂x−∂ax∂y)]j^+[bx(∂ax∂z−∂az∂x)−by(∂az∂y−∂ay∂z)]k^a⃗×(∇×b⃗)=∣i^j^k^axayaz∂bz∂y−∂by∂z∂bx∂z−∂bz∂x∂by∂x−∂bx∂y∣a⃗×(∇×b⃗)=[ay(∂by∂x−∂bx∂y)−az(∂bx∂z−∂bz∂x)]i^+[az(∂bz∂y−∂by∂z)−ax(∂by∂x−∂bx∂y)]j^+[ax(∂bx∂z−∂bz∂x)−ay(∂bz∂y−∂by∂z)]k^\vec{b} imes ( abla imes \vec{a}) = egin{vmatrix} \hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \b_x & b_y & b_z \ rac{\partial a_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial a_y}{\partial z} & rac{\partial a_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial a_z}{\partial x} & rac{\partial a_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial a_x}{\partial y}\end{vmatrix}\\vec{b} imes ( abla imes \vec{a}) = \left[ b_y\left( rac{\partial a_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial a_x}{\partial y} ight) - b_z\left( rac{\partial a_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial a_z}{\partial x} ight) ight] \hat{i} + \left[ b_z\left( rac{\partial a_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial a_y}{\partial z} ight) - b_x\left( rac{\partial a_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial a_x}{\partial y} ight) ight] \hat{j} + \left[ b_x\left( rac{\partial a_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial a_z}{\partial x} ight) - b_y\left( rac{\partial a_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial a_y}{\partial z} ight) ight] \hat{k}\\vec{a} imes ( abla imes \vec{b}) = egin{vmatrix} \hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \a_x & a_y & a_z \ rac{\partial b_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial b_y}{\partial z} & rac{\partial b_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial b_z}{\partial x} & rac{\partial b_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial b_x}{\partial y}\end{vmatrix}\\vec{a} imes ( abla imes \vec{b}) = \left[ a_y\left( rac{\partial b_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial b_x}{\partial y} ight) - a_z\left( rac{\partial b_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial b_z}{\partial x} ight) ight] \hat{i} + \left[ a_z\left( rac{\partial b_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial b_y}{\partial z} ight) - a_x\left( rac{\partial b_y}{\partial x} - rac{\partial b_x}{\partial y} ight) ight] \hat{j} + \left[ a_x\left( rac{\partial b_x}{\partial z} - rac{\partial b_z}{\partial x} ight) - a_y\left( rac{\partial b_z}{\partial y} - rac{\partial b_y}{\partial z} ight) ight] \hat{k}b×(∇×a)=​i^bx​∂y∂az​​−∂z∂ay​​​j^​by​∂z∂ax​​−∂x∂az​​​k^bz​∂x∂ay​​−∂y∂ax​​​​b×(∇×a)=[by​(∂x∂ay​​−∂y∂ax​​)−bz​(∂z∂ax​​−∂x∂az​​)]i^+[bz​(∂y∂az​​−∂z∂ay​​)−bx​(∂x∂ay​​−∂y∂ax​​)]j^​+[bx​(∂z∂ax​​−∂x∂az​​)−by​(∂y∂az​​−∂z∂ay​​)]k^a×(∇×b)=​i^ax​∂y∂bz​​−∂z∂by​​​j^​ay​∂z∂bx​​−∂x∂bz​​​k^az​∂x∂by​​−∂y∂bx​​​​a×(∇×b)=[ay​(∂x∂by​​−∂y∂bx​​)−az​(∂z∂bx​​−∂x∂bz​​)]i^+[az​(∂y∂bz​​−∂z∂by​​)−ax​(∂x∂by​​−∂y∂bx​​)]j^​+[ax​(∂z∂bx​​−∂x∂bz​​)−ay​(∂y∂bz​​−∂z∂by​​)]k^

因此可以得到:

∇(A⃗⋅B⃗)=b⃗×(∇×a⃗)+a⃗×(∇×b⃗)+(b⋅∇)a+(a⋅∇)b abla(\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B})=\vec{b} imes ( abla imes \vec{a})+\vec{a} imes ( abla imes \vec{b})+(b \cdot abla)a+(a \cdot abla)b∇(A⋅B)=b×(∇×a)+a×(∇×b)+(b⋅∇)a+(a⋅∇)b

第二个公式的推导

第二个公式是第一个公式的特例，其中 A⃗=B⃗=v⃗\vec{A} = \vec{B} = \vec{v}A=B=v。

将 A⃗=B⃗=v⃗\vec{A} = \vec{B} = \vec{v}A=B=v 代入第一个公式：

∇(v⃗⋅v⃗)=v⃗×(∇×v⃗)+(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗+v⃗×(∇×v⃗)+(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗ abla(\vec{v} \cdot \vec{v}) = \vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v}) + (\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} + \vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v}) + (\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v}∇(v⋅v)=v×(∇×v)+(v⋅∇)v+v×(∇×v)+(v⋅∇)v

简化得到：

∇(v⃗⋅v⃗)=2(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗+2v⃗×(∇×v⃗) abla(\vec{v} \cdot \vec{v}) = 2(\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} + 2\vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v})∇(v⋅v)=2(v⋅∇)v+2v×(∇×v)

注意 v⃗⋅v⃗=v2\vec{v} \cdot \vec{v} = v^2v⋅v=v2 是速度的平方。

第三个公式的推导

从第二个公式：

∇(v⃗⋅v⃗)=2(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗+2v⃗×(∇×v⃗) abla(\vec{v} \cdot \vec{v}) = 2(\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} + 2\vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v})∇(v⋅v)=2(v⋅∇)v+2v×(∇×v)

由于 v⃗⋅v⃗=v2\vec{v} \cdot \vec{v} = v^2v⋅v=v2，所以 ∇(v⃗⋅v⃗)=∇(v2)=2v∇v=2∇(v22) abla(\vec{v} \cdot \vec{v}) = abla(v^2) = 2v abla v = 2 abla\left( rac{v^2}{2} ight)∇(v⋅v)=∇(v2)=2v∇v=2∇(2v2​)

代入得到：

2∇(v22)=2(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗+2v⃗×(∇×v⃗)2 abla\left( rac{v^2}{2} ight) = 2(\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} + 2\vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v})2∇(2v2​)=2(v⋅∇)v+2v×(∇×v)

两边同除以2：

∇(v22)=(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗+v⃗×(∇×v⃗) abla\left( rac{v^2}{2} ight) = (\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} + \vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v})∇(2v2​)=(v⋅∇)v+v×(∇×v)

重新整理得到：

(v⃗⋅∇)v⃗=∇(v22)−v⃗×(∇×v⃗)(\vec{v} \cdot abla)\vec{v} = abla\left( rac{v^2}{2} ight) - \vec{v} imes ( abla imes \vec{v})(v⋅∇)v=∇(2v2​)−v×(∇×v)

entry.title: 复变函数
entry.content:
复数

加法与乘积

复数相关定义：

  • 有序实数对z=(x,y)称为复数
  • x称为z的实部，y称为z的虚部，
  • 记作x=Re z ,y=Im z

实数xxx可以看作复数(x,0)(x,0)(x,0)

若有两个复数zz=x1,y1z_{z}={x_{1},y_{1}}zz​=x1​,y1​和z2=(x2,y2)z_{2}=(x_{2},y_{2})z2​=(x2​,y2​)
满足zz=z2z_{z}=z_{2}zz​=z2​
当且仅当x1=x2y1=y2x_{1}=x_{2} \quad y_{1}=y_{2}x1​=x2​y1​=y2​

定义:复数加法:

(x1,y1)+(x2,y2)=((x1+x2),(y1+y2))(x_{1},y_{1})+(x_{2},y_{2})=((x_{1}+x_{2}),(y_{1}+y_{2}))(x1​,y1​)+(x2​,y2​)=((x1​+x2​),(y1​+y2​))

定义:复数乘法:

(x1,y1)(x2,y2)=((x1x2−y1y2),(y1x2+x1y2))(x_{1},y_{1})(x_{2},y_{2})=((x_{1}x_{2}-y_{1}y_{2}),(y_{1}x_{2}+x_{1}y_{2}))(x1​,y1​)(x2​,y2​)=((x1​x2​−y1​y2​),(y1​x2​+x1​y2​))

根据上述定义，

  • 当范围限制于实数时，上述定义符合实数运算法则:

(x1,0)+(x2,0)=(x1+x2,0)(x1,0)(x2,0)=(x1x2,0)(x_{1},0)+(x_{2},0)=(x_{1}+x_{2},0)\\(x_{1},0)(x_{2},0)=(x_{1}x_{2},0)(x1​,0)+(x2​,0)=(x1​+x2​,0)(x1​,0)(x2​,0)=(x1​x2​,0)

  • (0,1)(y,0)=(0,y)(0,1)(y,0)=(0,y)(0,1)(y,0)=(0,y),
    因此可知任何实数(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)
    由此可得两个特殊复数(1,0)(1,0)(1,0)和(0,1)(0,1)(0,1)

  • 记i=(0,1)i=(0,1)i=(0,1),故任意z=(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)=x+iyz=(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)=x+iyz=(x,y)=x(1,0)+y(0,1)=x+iy
    且i2=(−1,0)=−1i^{2}=(-1,0)=-1i2=(−1,0)=−1

基本代数性质

交换律:

z1+z2=z2+z1z1z2=z2z1z_{1}+z_{2}=z_{2}+z_{1}\\z_{1}z_{2}=z_{2}z_{1}z1​+z2​=z2​+z1​z1​z2​=z2​z1​

结合律:

(z1+z2)+z3=z1+(z2+z3)(z_{1}+z_{2})+z_{3}=z_{1}+(z_{2}+z_{3})(z1​+z2​)+z3​=z1​+(z2​+z3​)

分配律:

z(z1+z2)=zz1+zz2z(z_{1}+z_{2})=zz_{1}+zz_{2}z(z1​+z2​)=zz1​+zz2​

交换律和结合律和分配律自然可以从实数的交换律和结合律和分配律推导而来
例如:

z1+z2=(x1+x2,y1+y2)=(x2+x1,y2+y1)=z2+z1z_{1}+z_{2}=(x_{1}+x_{2},y_{1}+y_{2})=(x_{2}+x_{1},y_{2}+y_{1})=z_{2}+z_{1}z1​+z2​=(x1​+x2​,y1​+y2​)=(x2​+x1​,y2​+y1​)=z2​+z1​

实数的加法单位元(0,0)(0,0)(0,0)和乘法单位元(1,0)(1,0)(1,0)完全可以转移到复数来

z+0=zz⋅1=z\begin{aligned}z+0&=z\\z \cdot 1&=z \end{aligned}z+0z⋅1​=z=z​

  • 此外，0和1是唯一满足此性质的复数

  • 对于每一个复数zzz有唯一的负元(−z)(-z)(−z),满足z+(−z)=0z+(-z)=0z+(−z)=0

z+(−z)=0(x,y)+(u,v)=0(x+u,y+v)=0=（0，0）x+u=0y+v=0u=−xv=−y \begin{aligned} &z+(-z)=0 \\ &(x,y)+(u,v)=0 \\ &(x+u,y+v)=0=（0，0） \\ &x+u=0 \quad y+v=0 \\ &u=-x \quad v=-y &\end{aligned}​z+(−z)=0(x,y)+(u,v)=0(x+u,y+v)=0=（0，0）x+u=0y+v=0u=−xv=−y​​

定义减法:

z1−z2=z1+(−z2)z_{1}-z_{2}=z_{1}+(-z_{2})z1​−z2​=z1​+(−z2​)

故

z1−z2=(x1−x2,y1−y2)z_{1}-z_{2}=(x_{1}-x_{2},y_{1}-y_{2})z1​−z2​=(x1​−x2​,y1​−y2​)

对于任意非零复数(x,y)(x,y)(x,y),存在一个复数z−1z^{-1}z−1满足zz−1=1zz^{-1}=1zz−1=1

设

(x,y)(u,v)=1(x,y)(u,v)=1(x,y)(u,v)=1

可得:

xu−yv=1yu+xv=0xu-yv=1\\yu+xv=0xu−yv=1yu+xv=0

可以计算得到唯一解

u=xx2+y2v=−yx2+y2u = \frac{x}{x^{2}+y^{2}}\quadv = \frac{-y}{x^{2}+y^{2}}u=x2+y2x​v=x2+y2−y​

因此可知，非零复数z=(x,y)z=(x,y)z=(x,y)的乘法逆元是

z−1=(xx2+y2,−yx2+y2)z^{-1}=(\frac{x}{x^{2}+y^{2}},\frac{-y}{x^{2}+y^{2}})z−1=(x2+y2x​,x2+y2−y​)

其它性质

若

z1z2=0z_{1}z_{2}=0z1​z2​=0

则因子z1z_{1}z1​和z2z_{2}z2​中至少有一个零

假设z1z2=0z_{1}z_{2}=0z1​z2​=0
逆元z1−1z_{1}^{-1}z1−1​存在(即假设z1z_{1}z1​不等于0)

z2=1⋅z2=(z1−1z1)z2=z1−1(z1z2)=z1−1⋅0=0z_{2}=1 \cdot z_{2}=(z_{1}^{-1}z_{1})z_{2}=z_{1}^{-1}(z_{1}z_{2})=z_{1}^{-1} \cdot 0=0z2​=1⋅z2​=(z1−1​z1​)z2​=z1−1​(z1​z2​)=z1−1​⋅0=0

定义除法

z1z2=z1z2−1\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=z_{1}z_{2}^{-1}z2​z1​​=z1​z2−1​

且由上文已知

z−1=(xx2+y2,−yx2+y2)z^{-1}=(\frac{x}{x^{2}+y^{2}},\frac{-y}{x^{2}+y^{2}})z−1=(x2+y2x​,x2+y2−y​)

故

z1z2=(x1x2+y1y2x2+y2,y1x2−x1y2x2+y2)\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=(\frac{x_{1}x_{2}+y_{1}y_{2}}{x^{2}+y^{2}},\frac{y_{1}x_{2}-x_{1}y_{2}}{x^{2}+y^{2}})z2​z1​​=(x2+y2x1​x2​+y1​y2​​,x2+y2y1​x2​−x1​y2​​)

可以通过

z1z2=(x1+iy1)(x2−iy2)(x2+iy2)(x2−iy2)\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=\frac{(x_{1}+iy_{1})(x_{2}-iy_{2})}{(x_{2}+iy_{2})(x_{2}-iy_{2})}z2​z1​​=(x2​+iy2​)(x2​−iy2​)(x1​+iy1​)(x2​−iy2​)​

根据商的定义

  • z1+z2z3=(z1+z2)z3−1=z1z3−1+z2z3−1=z1z3+z1z3\frac{z_{1}+z_{2}}{z_{3}}=(z_{1}+z_{2})z_{3}^{-1}=z_{1}z_{3}^{-1}+z_{2}z_{3}^{-1}=\frac{z_{1}}{z_{3}}+\frac{z_{1}}{z_{3}}z3​z1​+z2​​=(z1​+z2​)z3−1​=z1​z3−1​+z2​z3−1​=z3​z1​​+z3​z1​​
  • 取z1=1z_{1}=1z1​=1
    1z2=1⋅z2−1=z2−1\frac{1}{z_{2}}=1 \cdot z_{2}^{-1}=z_{2}^{-1}z2​1​=1⋅z2−1​=z2−1​
    故z1z2=z1z2−1=z1(1z2)\frac{z_{1}}{z_{2}}=z_{1}z_{2}^{-1}=z_{1}(\frac{1}{z_{2}})z2​z1​​=z1​z2−1​=z1​(z2​1​)

同样，还有额外易证性质

  • (z1z2)(z1−1zz2−1)=(z1z1−1)(z2z2−1)=1(z1≠0z2≠0)(z_{1}z_{2})(z_{1}^{-1}z_{z_{2}}^{-1})=(z_{1}z_{1}^{-1})(z_{2}z_{2}^{-1})=1 \quad(z_{1} \ne 0 \quad z_{2} \ne 0)(z1​z2​)(z1−1​zz2​−1​)=(z1​z1−1​)(z2​z2−1​)=1(z1​=0z2​=0)
  • 1z1z2=(z1z2)−1=z1−1z2−1=(1z1)(1z2)(z1≠0z2≠0)\frac{1}{z_{1}z_{2}}=(z_{1}z_{2})^{-1}=z_{1}^{-1}z_{2}^{-1}=(\frac{1}{z_{1}})(\frac{1}{z_{2}})\quad(z_{1} \ne 0 \quad z_{2} \ne 0)z1​z2​1​=(z1​z2​)−1=z1−1​z2−1​=(z1​1​)(z2​1​)(z1​=0z2​=0)
  • z1z2z3z4=(z1z3)(z2z4)(z3≠0z4≠0)\frac{z_{1}z_{2}}{z_{3}z_{4}}=(\frac{z_{1}}{z_{3}})(\frac{z_{2}}{z_{4}})\quad(z_{3} \ne 0 \quad z_{4} \ne 0)z3​z4​z1​z2​​=(z3​z1​​)(z4​z2​​)(z3​=0z4​=0)

证明:

由交换律和结合律可知
(z1z2)(z3z4)=(z1z2)(z3z4)(z_{1}z_{2})(z_{3}z_{4})=(z_{1}z_{2})(z_{3}z_{4})(z1​z2​)(z3​z4​)=(z1​z2​)(z3​z4​)
故
(z1z2)(z1−1zz2−1)=(z1z1−1)(z2z2−1)=11z1z2=(z1z2)−1=z1−1z2−1=(1z1)(1z2)(z_{1}z_{2})(z_{1}^{-1}z_{z_{2}}^{-1})=(z_{1}z_{1}^{-1})(z_{2}z_{2}^{-1})=1 \\\frac{1}{z_{1}z_{2}}=(z_{1}z_{2})^{-1}=z_{1}^{-1}z_{2}^{-1}=(\frac{1}{z_{1}})(\frac{1}{z_{2}})(z1​z2​)(z1−1​zz2​−1​)=(z1​z1−1​)(z2​z2−1​)=1z1​z2​1​=(z1​z2​)−1=z1−1​z2−1​=(z1​1​)(z2​1​)
且
z1z2z3z4=(z1z2)(z3−1z4−1)=(z1z3−1)(z2z4−1)=(z1z3)(z2z4)\frac{z_{1}z_{2}}{z_{3}z_{4}}=({z_{1}z_{2}})({z_{3}^{-1}z_{4}^{-1}})=(z_{1}z_{3}^{-1})({z_{2}z_{4}}^{-1})=(\frac{z_{1}}{z_{3}})(\frac{z_{2}}{z_{4}})z3​z4​z1​z2​​=(z1​z2​)(z3−1​z4−1​)=(z1​z3−1​)(z2​z4​−1)=(z3​z1​​)(z4​z2​​)

entry.title: 流体力学基本方程——守恒定律
entry.content:
第4讲 流体力学基本方程——守恒定律

目录

  • 雷诺输运定理
  • 质量守恒
  • 动量守恒

雷诺输运定理

莱布尼茨定理

ddt∫x=a(t)x=b(t)F(x,t) dx=∫ab∂F∂t dx+dbdtF(b,t)−dadtF(a,t)\frac{d}{dt} \int_{x=a(t)}^{x=b(t)} F(x,t) \, dx = \int_{a}^{b} \frac{\partial F}{\partial t} \, dx + \frac{db}{dt}F(b,t) - \frac{da}{dt}F(a,t)dtd​∫x=a(t)x=b(t)​F(x,t)dx=∫ab​∂t∂F​dx+dtdb​F(b,t)−dtda​F(a,t)

莱布尼茨定理的三维扩展

ddt∫V∗(t)F(x,t) dV=lim⁡Δt→01Δt{∫V∗(t+Δt)F(x,t+Δt) dV−∫V∗(t)F(x,t) dV}∫V∗(t+Δt)F(x,t+Δt) dV≅∫V∗(t)F(x,t) dV+∫V∗(t)Δt∂F(x,t)∂t dV+∫ΔVF(x,t) dV+∫ΔVΔt∂F(x,t)∂t dV−∫V∗(t)F(x,t) dV⇒ddt∫V∗(t)F(x,t) dV=lim⁡Δt→01Δt{∫V∗(t)Δt∂F(x,t)∂t dV+∫ΔVF(x,t) dV}∫ΔVF(x,t) dV≅∫A∗(t)F(x,t)(bΔt⋅n) dAasΔt→0⇒ddt∫V∗(t)F(x,t) dV=∫V∗(t)∂F(x,t)∂t dV+∫A∗(t)F(x,t)b⋅n dA\begin{aligned}\frac{d}{dt} \int_{V^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV &= \lim_{\Delta t \to 0} \frac{1}{\Delta t} \left\{ \int_{V^*(t+\Delta t)} F(\mathbf{x}, t + \Delta t) \, dV - \int_{V^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV \right\} \\\\\int_{V^*(t+\Delta t)} F(\mathbf{x},t + \Delta t) \, dV &\cong \int_{V^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV + \int_{V^*(t)} \Delta t \frac{\partial F(\mathbf{x},t)}{\partial t} \, dV \\&+ \int_{\Delta V} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV + \int_{\Delta V} \Delta t \frac{\partial F(\mathbf{x},t)}{\partial t} \, dV- \int_{V^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV \\\\\Rightarrow \frac{d}{dt} \int_{V^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV &= \lim_{\Delta t \to 0} \frac{1}{\Delta t} \left\{ \int_{V^*(t)} \Delta t \frac{\partial F(\mathbf{x},t)}{\partial t} \, dV + \int_{\Delta V} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV \right\} \\\\\int_{\Delta V} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV &\cong \int_{A^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t)(\mathbf{b}\Delta t \cdot \mathbf{n}) \, dA \quad \text{as} \quad \Delta t \to 0 \\\\\Rightarrow \frac{d}{dt} \int_{V^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t) \, dV &= \int_{V^*(t)} \frac{\partial F(\mathbf{x},t)}{\partial t} \, dV + \int_{A^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t) \mathbf{b} \cdot \mathbf{n} \, dA\end{aligned}dtd​∫V∗(t)​F(x,t)dV∫V∗(t+Δt)​F(x,t+Δt)dV⇒dtd​∫V∗(t)​F(x,t)dV∫ΔV​F(x,t)dV⇒dtd​∫V∗(t)​F(x,t)dV​=Δt→0lim​Δt1​{∫V∗(t+Δt)​F(x,t+Δt)dV−∫V∗(t)​F(x,t)dV}≅∫V∗(t)​F(x,t)dV+∫V∗(t)​Δt∂t∂F(x,t)​dV+∫ΔV​F(x,t)dV+∫ΔV​Δt∂t∂F(x,t)​dV−∫V∗(t)​F(x,t)dV=Δt→0lim​Δt1​{∫V∗(t)​Δt∂t∂F(x,t)​dV+∫ΔV​F(x,t)dV}≅∫A∗(t)​F(x,t)(bΔt⋅n)dAasΔt→0=∫V∗(t)​∂t∂F(x,t)​dV+∫A∗(t)​F(x,t)b⋅ndA​

特殊形式

ddt∫V∗(t)F(x,t)dV=∫V∗(t)∂F(x,t)∂tdV+∫A∗(t)F(x,t)b⋅ndA\frac{d}{dt}\int_{V^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t)dV = \int_{V^*(t)} \frac{\partial F(\mathbf{x},t)}{\partial t}dV + \int_{A^*(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t)\mathbf{b} \cdot \mathbf{n}dAdtd​∫V∗(t)​F(x,t)dV=∫V∗(t)​∂t∂F(x,t)​dV+∫A∗(t)​F(x,t)b⋅ndA

■ Special forms

(1) F=1:ddt∫V∗(t)dV=∫A∗(t)b⋅ndA(1)\,F = 1: \quad \frac{d}{dt}\int_{V^*(t)} dV = \int_{A^*(t)} \mathbf{b}\cdot\mathbf{n}dA(1)F=1:dtd​∫V∗(t)​dV=∫A∗(t)​b⋅ndA

(2) b=0:ddt∫VF(x,t)dV=∫V∂F(x,t)∂tdV(2)\,\mathbf{b} = 0: \quad \frac{d}{dt}\int_{V} F(\mathbf{x},t)dV = \int_{V} \frac{\partial F(\mathbf{x},t)}{\partial t} dV(2)b=0:dtd​∫V​F(x,t)dV=∫V​∂t∂F(x,t)​dV

(3) b=u:DDt∫V(t)F(x,t)dV=∫V(t)∂F(x,t)∂tdV+∫A(t)F(x,t)u⋅ndA(3)\,\mathbf{b} = \mathbf{u}: \quad \frac{D}{Dt}\int_{V(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t)dV = \int_{V(t)} \frac{\partial F(\mathbf{x},t)}{\partial t} dV + \int_{A(t)} F(\mathbf{x},t)\mathbf{u}\cdot\mathbf{n}dA(3)b=u:DtD​∫V(t)​F(x,t)dV=∫V(t)​∂t∂F(x,t)​dV+∫A(t)​F(x,t)u⋅ndA

雷诺输运定理（三维莱布尼茨定理）

质量守恒

DDt∫VFdV=∫V∂F∂tdV+∫SF(u⋅n)dS\frac{D}{Dt}\int_{V} F dV = \int_{V} \frac{\partial F}{\partial t}dV + \int_{S} F (\mathbf{u} \cdot \mathbf{n})dSDtD​∫V​FdV=∫V​∂t∂F​dV+∫S​F(u⋅n)dS

DMDt=DDt∫Vρ(x,t)dV=0\frac{DM}{Dt} = \frac{D}{Dt}\int_{V} \rho(\mathbf{x},t)dV = 0DtDM​=DtD​∫V​ρ(x,t)dV=0

∫V(t)∂ρ∂tdV+∫A(t)ρ(x,t)(u(x,t)⋅n)dA=0\int_{V(t)} \frac{\partial \rho}{\partial t}dV + \int_{A(t)} \rho(\mathbf{x},t)(\mathbf{u}(\mathbf{x},t) \cdot \mathbf{n})dA = 0∫V(t)​∂t∂ρ​dV+∫A(t)​ρ(x,t)(u(x,t)⋅n)dA=0

对于表面为A∗(t)A*(t)A∗(t)的任意移动控制体V∗(t)V*(t)V∗(t)
瞬时与表面为A(t)A(t)A(t)的物质体积V(t)V(t)V(t)重合

雷诺输运定理：

  • F=ρF = ρF=ρ
  • 积分形式的连续性方程
  • 局部质量变化 + 穿过边界的质量流率 = 穿过移动边界的质量流率

质量守恒

应用高斯散度定理

微分形式：

∂ρ∂t+∇⋅(ρu)=0\frac{\partial \rho}{\partial t} + \nabla \cdot (\rho \mathbf{u}) = 0∂t∂ρ​+∇⋅(ρu)=0

另一种形式：

∂ρ∂t+u⋅∇ρ+ρ∇⋅u=0\frac{\partial \rho}{\partial t} + \mathbf{u} \cdot \nabla \rho + \rho \nabla \cdot \mathbf{u} = 0∂t∂ρ​+u⋅∇ρ+ρ∇⋅u=0

不可压缩流动与不可压缩流体

  • 不可压缩流动：流体粒子的密度不发生变化

    • 流动的性质
    • 常密度流动是不可压缩流动的子集
    • 在某些流动条件下，流动中密度变化很小，例如马赫数 < 0.3 的气体流动

  • 不可压缩流体：密度不随压力变化

    • 流体的性质
    • 液体几乎是不可压缩的
    • 气体是可压缩的

动量守恒

DDt∫VFdV=∫V∂F∂tdV+∫SF(u⋅n)dS\frac{D}{Dt}\int_{V} F dV = \int_{V} \frac{\partial F}{\partial t}dV + \int_{S} F (\mathbf{u} \cdot \mathbf{n})dSDtD​∫V​FdV=∫V​∂t∂F​dV+∫S​F(u⋅n)dS

积分形式：

F=ρuF = \rho \mathbf{u}F=ρu

牛顿第二定律：

DDt∫VρudV=∫VρfdV+∫An⋅τdA\frac{D}{Dt}\int_{V} \rho \mathbf{u} dV = \int_{V} \rho \mathbf{f} dV + \int_{A} \mathbf{n} \cdot \mathbf{\tau} dADtD​∫V​ρudV=∫V​ρfdV+∫A​n⋅τdA

动量守恒

任意移动控制体的积分形式：

∫V(t)∂(ρu)∂tdV+∫A(t)ρu(u⋅n)dA=∫V(t)ρfdV+∫A(t)n⋅τdA\int_{V(t)} \frac{\partial (\rho \mathbf{u})}{\partial t}dV + \int_{A(t)} \rho \mathbf{u}(\mathbf{u} \cdot \mathbf{n})dA = \int_{V(t)} \rho \mathbf{f} dV + \int_{A(t)} \mathbf{n} \cdot \mathbf{\tau} dA∫V(t)​∂t∂(ρu)​dV+∫A(t)​ρu(u⋅n)dA=∫V(t)​ρfdV+∫A(t)​n⋅τdA

微分形式：

∫A(t)n⋅τdA=∫V(t)∇⋅τdV\int_{A(t)} \mathbf{n} \cdot \mathbf{\tau} dA = \int_{V(t)} \nabla \cdot \mathbf{\tau} dV∫A(t)​n⋅τdA=∫V(t)​∇⋅τdV

∂(ρu)∂t+∇⋅(ρuu)=ρg+∇⋅τ\frac{\partial (\rho \mathbf{u})}{\partial t} + \nabla \cdot (\rho \mathbf{u}\mathbf{u}) = \rho \mathbf{g} + \nabla \cdot \mathbf{\tau}∂t∂(ρu)​+∇⋅(ρuu)=ρg+∇⋅τ

（守恒形式，在计算流体动力学中非常重要）

微分形式（非守恒形式）：

ρDuDt=ρ∂u∂t+ρ(u⋅∇)u=ρg+∇⋅τ\rho \frac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt} = \rho \frac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + \rho(\mathbf{u} \cdot \nabla)\mathbf{u} = \rho \mathbf{g} + \nabla \cdot \mathbf{\tau}ρDtDu​=ρ∂t∂u​+ρ(u⋅∇)u=ρg+∇⋅τ

推导非守恒形式的另一种方法：

∫VDDt(ρu)dV=∫VρDuDtdV\int_{V} \frac{D}{Dt}(\rho \mathbf{u})dV = \int_{V} \rho \frac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt}dV∫V​DtD​(ρu)dV=∫V​ρDtDu​dV

（通过雷诺第二输运定理）

∫V(ρDuDt−ρg−∇⋅τ)dV=0\int_{V} (\rho \frac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt} - \rho \mathbf{g} - \nabla \cdot \mathbf{\tau})dV = 0∫V​(ρDtDu​−ρg−∇⋅τ)dV=0

entry.title: 流体力学基本方程推论
entry.content:
守恒定律

第5讲 动量守恒

积分形式，物质体积

任意移动控制体的积分形式

选择 V∗(t)V^*(t)V∗(t) 与 V(t)V(t)V(t) 瞬时重合，则

(f,t,n)=(τ,x,n)(f, t, \mathbf{n}) = ( au, \mathbf{x}, \mathbf{n})(f,t,n)=(τ,x,n)

微分形式

∂∂t∫V(t)ρudV+∫V(t)∇⋅(ρuu)dV=∫V(t)ρgdV+∫V(t)∇⋅τdV rac{\partial}{\partial t}\int_{V(t)} ho \mathbf{u} dV + \int_{V(t)} abla \cdot ( ho \mathbf{u} \mathbf{u}) dV = \int_{V(t)} ho \mathbf{g} dV + \int_{V(t)} abla \cdot \mathbf{ au} dV∂t∂​∫V(t)​ρudV+∫V(t)​∇⋅(ρuu)dV=∫V(t)​ρgdV+∫V(t)​∇⋅τdV

∂(ρu)∂t+∇⋅(ρuu)=ρg+∇⋅τ rac{\partial ( ho \mathbf{u})}{\partial t} + abla \cdot ( ho \mathbf{u} \mathbf{u}) = ho \mathbf{g} + abla \cdot \mathbf{ au}∂t∂(ρu)​+∇⋅(ρuu)=ρg+∇⋅τ

(守恒形式)

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=ρgj+∂τij∂xi rac{\partial ( ho u_j)}{\partial t} + rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}( ho u_i u_j) = ho g_j + rac{\partial au_{ij}}{\partial x_i}∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=ρgj​+∂xi​∂τij​​

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=ρ∂uj∂t+uj∂ρ∂t+ρui∂uj∂xi+uj∂∂xi(ρui) rac{\partial ( ho u_j)}{\partial t} + rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}( ho u_i u_j) = ho rac{\partial u_j}{\partial t} + u_j rac{\partial ho}{\partial t} + ho u_i rac{\partial u_j}{\partial x_i} + u_j rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}( ho u_i)∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=ρ∂t∂uj​​+uj​∂t∂ρ​+ρui​∂xi​∂uj​​+uj​∂xi​∂​(ρui​)

ρ∂uj∂t+ρui∂uj∂xi=ρDujDt=ρg+∇⋅τ ho rac{\partial u_j}{\partial t} + ho u_i rac{\partial u_j}{\partial x_i} = ho rac{D u_j}{D t} = ho \mathbf{g} + abla \cdot \mathbf{ au}ρ∂t∂uj​​+ρui​∂xi​∂uj​​=ρDtDuj​​=ρg+∇⋅τ

ρDuDt=ρ∂u∂t+ρu⋅∇u=ρg+∇⋅τ ho rac{D \mathbf{u}}{D t} = ho rac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + ho \mathbf{u} \cdot abla \mathbf{u} = ho \mathbf{g} + abla \cdot \mathbf{ au}ρDtDu​=ρ∂t∂u​+ρu⋅∇u=ρg+∇⋅τ

(非守恒形式)

牛顿流体的本构方程

  • 应力张量对称 τij=τji au_{ij} = au_{ji}τij​=τji​
  • 应力 τij au_{ij}τij​ 与 ∂ui∂xj rac{\partial u_i}{\partial x_j}∂xj​∂ui​​ 之间的线性本构方程，牛顿流体

静态流体 τij=−pδij au_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij}τij​=−pδij​，热力学压力

运动流体 τij=−pδij+σij au_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + \sigma_{ij}τij​=−pδij​+σij​

偏应力张量 σij=Kijmn∂um∂xn\sigma_{ij} = K_{ijmn} rac{\partial u_m}{\partial x_n}σij​=Kijmn​∂xn​∂um​​ 或 σij=KijmnSmn\sigma_{ij} = K_{ijmn} S_{mn}σij​=Kijmn​Smn​

各向同性流体介质
在i和j上对称，σij=λSmmδij+2μSij\sigma_{ij} = \lambda S_{mm} \delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij}σij​=λSmm​δij​+2μSij​，

τij=−pδij+λSmmδij+2μSij au_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + \lambda S_{mm} \delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij}τij​=−pδij​+λSmm​δij​+2μSij​

平均压力（动态压力）p=−13τiip = - rac{1}{3} au_{ii}p=−31​τii​

p=p−23μ∇⋅u−λ∇⋅up = p - rac{2}{3}\mu abla \cdot \mathbf{u} - \lambda abla \cdot \mathbf{u}p=p−32​μ∇⋅u−λ∇⋅u

体积黏度系数 λ+23μ=ζv\lambda + rac{2}{3}\mu = \zeta_vλ+32​μ=ζv​

τij=−pδij+2μSij−23μSmmδij+λSmmδij=−pδij+2μSij+(λ−23μ)Smmδij=−pδij+2μSij+ζvSmmδij au_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij} - rac{2}{3}\mu S_{mm}\delta_{ij} + \lambda S_{mm}\delta_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij} + (\lambda - rac{2}{3}\mu)S_{mm}\delta_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij} + \zeta_v S_{mm}\delta_{ij}τij​=−pδij​+2μSij​−32​μSmm​δij​+λSmm​δij​=−pδij​+2μSij​+(λ−32​μ)Smm​δij​=−pδij​+2μSij​+ζv​Smm​δij​

斯托克斯流体，λ+23μ=ζv=0\lambda + rac{2}{3}\mu = \zeta_v = 0λ+32​μ=ζv​=0，p=pp = pp=p，τij=−pδij+2μSij−23μSmmδij au_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij} - rac{2}{3}\mu S_{mm}\delta_{ij}τij​=−pδij​+2μSij​−32​μSmm​δij​

不可压缩流体，∇⋅u=0 abla \cdot \mathbf{u} = 0∇⋅u=0，p=pp = pp=p，τij=−pδij+2μSij au_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij}τij​=−pδij​+2μSij​

非牛顿流体，例如剪切变稀

纳维-斯托克斯动量方程

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=ρgj+∂τij∂xi rac{\partial ( ho u_j)}{\partial t} + rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}( ho u_i u_j) = ho g_j + rac{\partial au_{ij}}{\partial x_i}∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=ρgj​+∂xi​∂τij​​

τij=−pδij+2μSij+(λ−23μ)Smmδij=−pδij+2μSij+ζvSmmδij au_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij} + (\lambda - rac{2}{3}\mu)S_{mm}\delta_{ij} = -p\delta_{ij} + 2\mu S_{ij} + \zeta_v S_{mm}\delta_{ij}τij​=−pδij​+2μSij​+(λ−32​μ)Smm​δij​=−pδij​+2μSij​+ζv​Smm​δij​

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=ρgj−∂p∂xj+∂∂xi[2μ(∂uj∂xi)+(λ−23μ)δij∂um∂xm] rac{\partial ( ho u_j)}{\partial t} + rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}( ho u_i u_j) = ho g_j - rac{\partial p}{\partial x_j} + rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}[2\mu( rac{\partial u_j}{\partial x_i}) + (\lambda - rac{2}{3}\mu)\delta_{ij} rac{\partial u_m}{\partial x_m}]∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=ρgj​−∂xj​∂p​+∂xi​∂​[2μ(∂xi​∂uj​​)+(λ−32​μ)δij​∂xm​∂um​​]

与连续性方程结合：4个方程，5个依赖变量 ρ,p,u ho, p, \mathbf{u}ρ,p,u

流体动力学的完整描述：

  • ρ hoρ 为常数
  • p=p(ρ)p = p( ho)p=p(ρ)，正压的
  • p=p(ρ,T)p = p( ho, T)p=p(ρ,T)，必须考虑内能，e=e(ρ,T)e = e( ho, T)e=e(ρ,T)
  • 额外方程：能量方程，能量守恒

黏度系数为常数

∂(ρuj)∂t+∂∂xi(ρuiuj)=ρgj−∂p∂xj+μ∂2uj∂xi2+(λ+13μ)∂∂xj(∂um∂xm) rac{\partial ( ho u_j)}{\partial t} + rac{\partial}{\partial x_i}( ho u_i u_j) = ho g_j - rac{\partial p}{\partial x_j} + \mu rac{\partial^2 u_j}{\partial x_i^2} + (\lambda + rac{1}{3}\mu) rac{\partial}{\partial x_j}( rac{\partial u_m}{\partial x_m})∂t∂(ρuj​)​+∂xi​∂​(ρui​uj​)=ρgj​−∂xj​∂p​+μ∂xi2​∂2uj​​+(λ+31​μ)∂xj​∂​(∂xm​∂um​​)

不可压缩

∂uj∂t+ui∂uj∂xi=gj−1ρ∂p∂xj+ν∂2uj∂xi2 rac{\partial u_j}{\partial t} + u_i rac{\partial u_j}{\partial x_i} = g_j - rac{1}{ ho} rac{\partial p}{\partial x_j} + u rac{\partial^2 u_j}{\partial x_i^2}∂t∂uj​​+ui​∂xi​∂uj​​=gj​−ρ1​∂xj​∂p​+ν∂xi2​∂2uj​​

ρDuDt=ρ∂u∂t+ρ(u⋅∇)u=−∇p+ρg+μ∇2u ho rac{D \mathbf{u}}{D t} = ho rac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + ho (\mathbf{u} \cdot abla) \mathbf{u} = - abla p + ho \mathbf{g} + \mu abla^2 \mathbf{u}ρDtDu​=ρ∂t∂u​+ρ(u⋅∇)u=−∇p+ρg+μ∇2u

μ∇2u=μ∇×(∇×u)=μ∇×ω\mu abla^2 \mathbf{u} = \mu abla imes ( abla imes \mathbf{u}) = \mu abla imes \mathbf{\omega}μ∇2u=μ∇×(∇×u)=μ∇×ω

矛盾：黏性力取决于涡量。实际上，它取决于涡量的空间导数，而不是均匀涡量

无黏流体，欧拉方程

ρDuDt=ρ∂u∂t+ρ(u⋅∇)u=−∇p+ρg ho rac{D \mathbf{u}}{D t} = ho rac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} + ho (\mathbf{u} \cdot abla) \mathbf{u} = - abla p + ho \mathbf{g}ρDtDu​=ρ∂t∂u​+ρ(u⋅∇)u=−∇p+ρg

运动学

第6讲 能量守恒，动态相似性

4.8 能量方程

积分形式

  • 物质体积 V(t)V(t)V(t) 与表面积 A(t)A(t)A(t)

∂ϕ∂t+12∣∇ϕ∣2+∫dpρ+gz=R(t)+C rac{\partial \phi}{\partial t} + rac{1}{2}| abla \phi|^2 + \int rac{dp}{ ho} + gz = R(t) + C∂t∂ϕ​+21​∣∇ϕ∣2+∫ρdp​+gz=R(t)+C

处处

2nd Bernoulli方程

  • 稳态，无旋，无热传递，势力，来自能量方程

4.9.3 Neglect of Gravity in Constant Density Flows

常密度流中重力的忽略（在4.9节）

Hydrostatics:

0=−∇p+ρg0 = - abla p + ho \mathbf{g}0=−∇p+ρg

ρDuDt=−∇p+ρg∗+μ∇2u ho rac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt} = - abla p + ho \mathbf{g}^* + \mu abla^2 \mathbf{u}ρDtDu​=−∇p+ρg∗+μ∇2u

4.9.4 The Boussinesq Approximation

(1) 密度变化可以忽略，除了在体力项中；

(2) 流体特性被视为常数 (μ,k,Cp)(μ, k, C_{p})(μ,k,Cp​)

连续性方程

∇⋅u=0 abla \cdot \mathbf{u} = 0∇⋅u=0

         不能应用于高速，大垂直尺度

(1/ρ0)(Dρ/Dt)=(1/ρ0)(∂ρ/∂t)−(U/ρ0)(∂ρ/∂x)≈−βg/ρ≈αδT≪1(1/ ho_0)(D ho/Dt) = (1/ ho_0)(∂ ho/∂t) - (U/ ho_0)(∂ ho/∂x) \approx -βg/ρ ≈ αδT ≪ 1(1/ρ0​)(Dρ/Dt)=(1/ρ0​)(∂ρ/∂t)−(U/ρ0​)(∂ρ/∂x)≈−βg/ρ≈αδT≪1

小温度差，ρ≈ρ0[1−α(T−T0)]ρ ≈ ρ_0[1 - α(T - T_0)]ρ≈ρ0​[1−α(T−T0​)]

动量方程

ρ∗DuDt=−∇p+ρg+μ∗∇2u ho^* rac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt} = - abla p + ho \mathbf{g} + \mu^* abla^2 \mathbf{u}ρ∗DtDu​=−∇p+ρg+μ∗∇2u

ρ0DuDt=−1ρ0∇p′+ρgρ0+μ∗∇2uρ0 ho_0 rac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt} = - rac{1}{ ho_0} abla p' + rac{ ho \mathbf{g}}{ ho_0} + rac{\mu^* abla^2 \mathbf{u}}{ ho_0}ρ0​DtDu​=−ρ0​1​∇p′+ρ0​ρg​+ρ0​μ∗∇2u​

ρ/ρ0≈1 ho/ ho_0 \approx 1ρ/ρ0​≈1 和 μ/ρ0≈v\mu/ ho_0 \approx vμ/ρ0​≈v

DuDt=−1ρ0∇p′+g+v∇2u rac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt} = - rac{1}{ ho_0} abla p' + \mathbf{g} + v abla^2 \mathbf{u}DtDu​=−ρ0​1​∇p′+g+v∇2u

能量方程

ρCpDTDt=−∇⋅q+με−∇⋅qr ho C_p rac{DT}{Dt} = - abla \cdot \mathbf{q} + \mu \varepsilon - abla \cdot \mathbf{q}_rρCp​DtDT​=−∇⋅q+με−∇⋅qr​

−∇⋅q=μρD(e/ρ)DtDTDt=ρD(e/ρ)ρCp∂T/∂eDTDt=−ρ∇⋅uρDTDt- abla \cdot \mathbf{q} = \mu rac{ρ D(e/ρ)}{Dt} rac{DT}{Dt} = rac{ρ D(e/ρ)}{ρ C_p \partial T/\partial e} rac{DT}{Dt} = - rac{ρ abla \cdot \mathbf{u}}{ρ} rac{DT}{Dt}−∇⋅q=μDtρD(e/ρ)​DtDT​=ρCp​∂T/∂eρD(e/ρ)​DtDT​=−ρρ∇⋅u​DtDT​

假设完美气体，其中p=ρRT,Cp−Cv=Rp = ρRT, C_p - C_v = Rp=ρRT,Cp​−Cv​=R，和α=1/Tα = 1/Tα=1/T,

−∇⋅q=−ρRTDtDt=−ρ(Cp−Cv)DTDt- abla \cdot \mathbf{q} = -ρRT rac{Dt}{Dt} = -ρ(C_p - C_v) rac{DT}{Dt}−∇⋅q=−ρRTDtDt​=−ρ(Cp​−Cv​)DtDT​

ρCpDTDt=ρ∇⋅qρC_p rac{DT}{Dt} = ρ abla \cdot \mathbf{q}ρCp​DtDT​=ρ∇⋅q

在典型情况下它极其小，因此

DTDt=κ∇2T,κ=k/(ρCp) rac{DT}{Dt} = κ abla^2 T, \quad κ = k/(ρC_p)DtDT​=κ∇2T,κ=k/(ρCp​)

Noninertial Frame of Reference

w=∂x∂t+∂x∂ξ⋅∂ξ∂t=U+∂(r+ξ1e1+ξ2e2+ξ3e3)∂t\mathbf{w} = rac{\partial \mathbf{x}}{\partial t} + rac{\partial \mathbf{x}}{\partial oldsymbol{\xi}} \cdot rac{\partial oldsymbol{\xi}}{\partial t} = \mathbf{U} + rac{\partial(\mathbf{r} + \xi_1\mathbf{e}_1 + \xi_2\mathbf{e}_2 + \xi_3\mathbf{e}_3)}{\partial t}w=∂t∂x​+∂ξ∂x​⋅∂t∂ξ​=U+∂t∂(r+ξ1​e1​+ξ2​e2​+ξ3​e3​)​

=U+∂r∂t+∂ξ1∂te1+∂ξ2∂te2+∂ξ3∂te3+ξ1∂e1∂t+ξ2∂e2∂t+ξ3∂e3∂t=U+Ut+Ω×ξ.= \mathbf{U} + rac{\partial \mathbf{r}}{\partial t} + rac{\partial \xi_1}{\partial t}\mathbf{e}_1 + rac{\partial \xi_2}{\partial t}\mathbf{e}_2 + rac{\partial \xi_3}{\partial t}\mathbf{e}_3 + \xi_1 rac{\partial \mathbf{e}_1}{\partial t} + \xi_2 rac{\partial \mathbf{e}_2}{\partial t} + \xi_3 rac{\partial \mathbf{e}_3}{\partial t} = \mathbf{U} + \mathbf{U}_t + oldsymbol{\Omega} imes oldsymbol{\xi}.=U+∂t∂r​+∂t∂ξ1​​e1​+∂t∂ξ2​​e2​+∂t∂ξ3​​e3​+ξ1​∂t∂e1​​+ξ2​∂t∂e2​​+ξ3​∂t∂e3​​=U+Ut​+Ω×ξ.

∂ei∂t=Ω×ei rac{\partial \mathbf{e}_i}{\partial t} = oldsymbol{\Omega} imes \mathbf{e}_i∂t∂ei​​=Ω×ei​

a=dwdt=∂w∂t+(U+Ut+Ω×ξ)⋅∇w=∂U∂t+w⋅∇U+2Ω×w+∂Ω∂t×ξ+Ω×(Ω×ξ)\mathbf{a} = rac{d\mathbf{w}}{dt} = rac{\partial \mathbf{w}}{\partial t} + (\mathbf{U} + \mathbf{U}_t + oldsymbol{\Omega} imes oldsymbol{\xi}) \cdot abla \mathbf{w} = rac{\partial \mathbf{U}}{\partial t} + \mathbf{w} \cdot abla \mathbf{U} + 2 oldsymbol{\Omega} imes \mathbf{w} + rac{\partial oldsymbol{\Omega}}{\partial t} imes oldsymbol{\xi} + oldsymbol{\Omega} imes ( oldsymbol{\Omega} imes oldsymbol{\xi})a=dtdw​=∂t∂w​+(U+Ut​+Ω×ξ)⋅∇w=∂t∂U​+w⋅∇U+2Ω×w+∂t∂Ω​×ξ+Ω×(Ω×ξ)

相对, Coriolis, 角, 离心力

(DuDt)ABS=(DwDt)REL+∂U∂t+2Ω×w+∂Ω∂t×ξ+Ω×(Ω×ξ)\left( rac{D\mathbf{u}}{Dt} ight)_{ABS} = \left( rac{D\mathbf{w}}{Dt} ight)_{REL} + rac{\partial \mathbf{U}}{\partial t} + 2 oldsymbol{\Omega} imes \mathbf{w} + rac{\partial oldsymbol{\Omega}}{\partial t} imes oldsymbol{\xi} + oldsymbol{\Omega} imes ( oldsymbol{\Omega} imes oldsymbol{\xi})(DtDu​)ABS​=(DtDw​)REL​+∂t∂U​+2Ω×w+∂t∂Ω​×ξ+Ω×(Ω×ξ)

不可压流

ρ(DwDt)REL=−∇p+ρg−ρ∂U∂t−2ρΩ×w−ρ∂Ω∂t×ξ−ρΩ×(Ω×ξ)+μ∇2w ho \left( rac{D\mathbf{w}}{Dt} ight)_{REL} = - abla p + ho \mathbf{g} - ho rac{\partial \mathbf{U}}{\partial t} - 2 ho oldsymbol{\Omega} imes \mathbf{w} - ho rac{\partial oldsymbol{\Omega}}{\partial t} imes oldsymbol{\xi} - ho oldsymbol{\Omega} imes ( oldsymbol{\Omega} imes oldsymbol{\xi}) + \mu abla^2 \mathbf{w}ρ(DtDw​)REL​=−∇p+ρg−ρ∂t∂U​−2ρΩ×w−ρ∂t∂Ω​×ξ−ρΩ×(Ω×ξ)+μ∇2w

entry.title: 场论
entry.content:
φ=φ(r,t)=φ(x,y,z,t)a=a(r,t)=a(x,y,z,t)\varphi=\varphi(\boldsymbol{r},t)=\varphi(x,y,z,t)\\\boldsymbol{a}=\boldsymbol{a}(\boldsymbol{r},t)=\boldsymbol{a}(x,y,z,t)φ=φ(r,t)=φ(x,y,z,t)a=a(r,t)=a(x,y,z,t)

定常场:场内函数值不依赖于时间，即不随时间t变化:

φ=φ(r)a=a(r)\varphi=\varphi(\boldsymbol{r}) \quad\boldsymbol{a}=\boldsymbol{a}(\boldsymbol{r})φ=φ(r)a=a(r)

均匀场:同一时刻场内各点函数值都相等:

φ=φ(t)a=a(t)\varphi=\varphi(t)\quad\boldsymbol{a}=\boldsymbol{a}(t)φ=φ(t)a=a(t)

entry.title: plane rti
entry.content:
平面和球不稳定性简论

平面

控制方程和边界条件

假设流体层上下均为无旋流：

u⃗=∇ Φ\vec{u} = abla\ \Phiu=∇ Φ

Φ={Φ1Φ2\Phi = egin{cases}\Phi_1\\Phi_2\end{cases}Φ={Φ1​Φ2​​

z=ζ(x,y,t)z = \zeta(x,y,t)z=ζ(x,y,t)

首先由连续性方程有：

1ρDρDt+∇⋅u⃗=0 rac{1}{ ho} rac{D ho}{Dt} + abla \cdot \vec{u} = 0ρ1​DtDρ​+∇⋅u=0

因为不可压缩：

DρDt=0 rac{D ho}{Dt} = 0DtDρ​=0

因此有：

∇⋅u⃗=0Δ Φ1=0Δ Φ2=0 egin{alignat*}{3} abla \cdot \vec{u} &= 0\ \mathrm{\Delta} ~ \Phi_{1}&= 0\ \mathrm{\Delta} ~ \Phi_{2} &= 0\end{alignat*}∇⋅uΔ Φ1​Δ Φ2​​=0=0=0​

边界条件

周期性边界条件，默认 x 和 y 方向为周期性边界。
初始扰动可以假设发生在有限区域内，因此在所有时间里，扰动都是有界的（有限的）。
当

z→±∞，∇ Φ→Uz o \pm \infty ， abla\ \Phi ightarrow Uz→±∞，∇ Φ→U

界面条件

界面上的流体粒子必须与界面一起移动：意味界面是连续的，没有滑移或分离。流体粒子始终保持在界面上。

两种流体不能在同一时间占据同一点，并且两种流体之间不能形成空腔：确保流体的物理完整性。流体不能相互穿透，并且界面必须保持连续，没有空隙。

界面法向速度=流体法向速度：

∂Φi∂z=∂Φi∂t+∂Φi∂x∂ζ∂x+∂Φi∂y∂ζ∂y rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial t} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial x} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial y} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial y}∂z∂Φi​​=∂t∂Φi​​+∂x∂Φi​​∂x∂ζ​+∂y∂Φi​​∂y∂ζ​

压力在交界面上连续：

由伯努利方程:

∂Φi∂t+12(∇Φi)2−piρi+gz=Ci rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial t} + rac{1}{2} \left( abla\Phi_{i} ight)^{2} - rac{p_{i}}{ ho_{i}} + gz = C_{i}∂t∂Φi​​+21​(∇Φi​)2−ρi​pi​​+gz=Ci​

有：

ρ1{C1−12(∇Φ1)2−∂Φ1∂t−gz}=ρ2{C2−12(∇Φ2)2−∂Φ2∂t−gz}(z=ζ) ho_{1}\{ C_{1} - rac{1}{2}{( abla\Phi_{1})}^{2} - rac{\partial\Phi_{1}}{\partial t} - gz\} = ho_{2}\{ C_{2} - rac{1}{2}{( abla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - rac{\partial\Phi_{2}}{\partial t} - gz\}\quad(z=ζ)ρ1​{C1​−21​(∇Φ1​)2−∂t∂Φ1​​−gz}=ρ2​{C2​−21​(∇Φ2​)2−∂t∂Φ2​​−gz}(z=ζ)

初始时分无扰动：

ρ1{C1−12U12}=ρ2{C2−12U22}(z=0){ ho}_{1} \left\{ C_{1} - rac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} ight\} = ho_{2}\left\{ C_{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{2}}^{2} ight\}\quad(z=0)ρ1​{C1​−21​U1​2}=ρ2​{C2​−21​U2​2}(z=0)

两式相减：

ρ1{12(∇Φ1)2−12U12+∂Φ1∂t+gz}=ρ2{12(∇Φ2)2−12U22+∂Φ2∂t+gz} ho_{1}\{ rac{1}{2} \left( abla \Phi_{1} ight)^{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} + rac{\partial \Phi_{1}}{\partial t} + gz\} = ho_{2}\{ rac{1}{2} {( abla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - rac{1}{2} {U_{2}}^{2} + rac{\partial \Phi_{2}}{\partial t} + gz\}ρ1​{21​(∇Φ1​)2−21​U1​2+∂t∂Φ1​​+gz}=ρ2​{21​(∇Φ2​)2−21​U2​2+∂t∂Φ2​​+gz}

完全耦合方程变为：

ΔΦ1=0，ΔΦ2=0\mathrm{\Delta} \Phi_{1} = 0，\mathrm{\Delta} \Phi_{2} = 0ΔΦ1​=0，ΔΦ2​=0

当

z→±∞,∇ Φ→0z o \pm \infty , abla\ \Phi o 0 z→±∞,∇ Φ→0

∂Φi∂z=∂ζ∂t+∂Φi∂x∂ζ∂x+∂Φi∂y∂ζ∂y(z=ζ，i=1,2) rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial t} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial x} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} + rac{\partial \Phi_{i}}{\partial y} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial y}\quad(z = \zeta ，i = 1,2)∂z∂Φi​​=∂t∂ζ​+∂x∂Φi​​∂x∂ζ​+∂y∂Φi​​∂y∂ζ​(z=ζ，i=1,2)

ρ1{12(∇Φ1)2−12U12+∂Φ1∂t+gz}=ρ2{12(∇Φ2)2−12U22+∂Φ2∂t+gz} ho_{1} \{ rac{1}{2} ( abla \Phi_{1} )^{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{1}}^{2} + rac{\partial \Phi_{1}}{\partial t} + gz \} = ho_{2}\{ rac{1}{2}{( abla\Phi_{2})}^{2} - rac{1}{2}{U_{2}}^{2} + rac{\partial\Phi_{2}}{\partial t} + gz\}ρ1​{21​(∇Φ1​)2−21​U1​2+∂t∂Φ1​​+gz}=ρ2​{21​(∇Φ2​)2−21​U2​2+∂t∂Φ2​​+gz}

线化方程

Φ1=U1x+Φ1′(z>ζ),Φ2=U2x+Φ2′(z<ζ){\Phi_{1} = U_{1}x + \Phi}_{1}^{'}(z > \zeta),\Phi_{2}{= U_{2}x + \Phi}_{2}^{'}(z < \zeta)Φ1​=U1​x+Φ1′​(z>ζ),Φ2​=U2​x+Φ2′​(z<ζ)

当交界面位移和斜率都很小，将方程线性化得到:

Δ  Φ1′=0(z>0),Δ Φ2′=0(z<0)\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{1}^{'} = 0(z > 0),\mathrm{\Delta}\ \Phi_{2}^{'} = 0(z < 0)Δ  Φ1′​=0(z>0),Δ Φ2′​=0(z<0)

ifz→±∞，∇ Φ′→0\quad z o \pm \infty ， abla\ \Phi^{'} o 0z→±∞，∇ Φ′→0

∂Φi′∂z=∂ζ∂t+Ui∂ζ∂x(z=0，i=1,2) rac{\partial {\Phi_{i}}^{'}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial t} + U_{i} rac{\partial \zeta}{\partial x} \quad(z = 0，i = 1,2)∂z∂Φi​′​=∂t∂ζ​+Ui​∂x∂ζ​(z=0，i=1,2)

ρ1U1∂Φ1′∂x+∂Φ1′∂t+gζ)=ρ2(U2∂Φ2′∂x+∂Φ2′∂t+gζ)(z=0) ho_{1}{U}_{1} rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta) = ho_{2}\left( U_{2} rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta ight)\quad(z = 0)ρ1​U1​∂x∂Φ1​′​+∂t∂Φ1​′​+gζ)=ρ2​(U2​∂x∂Φ2​′​+∂t∂Φ2​′​+gζ)(z=0)

任意的扰动都可以分解成以下形式的独立模式：

(ζ，Φ1′，Φ2′)=(ζ^，Φ^1，Φ^2)ei(kx+ly)+st\left( \zeta ，{\Phi_{1}}^{'}，{\Phi_{2}}^{'} ight) = (\widehat{\zeta}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2})e^{i(kx + ly) + st}(ζ，Φ1​′，Φ2​′)=(ζ​，Φ1​，Φ2​)ei(kx+ly)+st

代入方程：

Δ  Φ1′=0(z>0),Δ  Φ2′=0(z<0)\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{1}^{'} = 0(z > 0),\mathrm{\Delta}\ \ \Phi_{2}^{'} = 0(z < 0)Δ  Φ1′​=0(z>0),Δ  Φ2′​=0(z<0)

可以得到：

d2Φ^1dz2−l2Φ^1−k2Φ^1=0 rac{d^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1}}{dz^{2}} - l^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} - k^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = 0dz2d2Φ1​​−l2Φ1​−k2Φ1​=0

d2Φ^2dz2−l2Φ^2−k2Φ^2=0 rac{d^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2}}{dz^{2}} - l^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} - k^{2}{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = 0dz2d2Φ2​​−l2Φ2​−k2Φ2​=0

可以解得：

Φ^2=A2e−k~z+B2ek~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = A_{2}e^{- \widetilde{k}z} + B_{2}e^{\widetilde{k}z}Φ2​=A2​e−kz+B2​ekz

Φ^1=A1ek~z+B1e−k~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = A_{1}e^{\widetilde{k}z} + B_{1}e^{- \widetilde{k}z}Φ1​=A1​ekz+B1​e−kz

其中k~=(k2+l2)1/2\widetilde{k} = {(k^{2} + l^{2})}^{1/2}k=(k2+l2)1/2

再利用边界条件：当z→±∞z o \pm \inftyz→±∞时，∇ Φ′→0 abla\ \Phi^{'} o 0∇ Φ′→0

Φ^2=A2e−k~z，Φ^1=A1ek~z{\widehat{\Phi}}_{2} = A_{2}e^{- \widetilde{k}z}，{\widehat{\Phi}}_{1} = A_{1}e^{\widetilde{k}z}Φ2​=A2​e−kz，Φ1​=A1​ekz

再根据

∂Φi′∂z=∂ζ∂t+Ui∂ζ∂x(z=0，i=1,2) rac{\partial{\Phi_{i}}^{'}}{\partial z} = rac{\partial\zeta}{\partial t} + U_{i} rac{\partial\zeta}{\partial x}\quad(z = 0，i = 1,2)∂z∂Φi​′​=∂t∂ζ​+Ui​∂x∂ζ​(z=0，i=1,2)

可以解得

A2=−(s+ikU2)ζ^/k~A1=(s+ikU1)ζ^/k~2 egin{alignat*}{2} A_{2} &= - (s + ikU_{2}) \widehat{\zeta}/ \widetilde{k} \ A_{1} &= (s + ikU_{1}) \widehat{\zeta}/ \widetilde{k}\end{alignat*}{2}A2​A1​​=−(s+ikU2​)ζ​/k=(s+ikU1​)ζ​/k​2

根据方程

ρ1(U2∂Φ1′∂x+∂Φ1′∂t+gζ)=ρ2(U2∂Φ2′∂x+∂Φ2′∂t+gζ)(z=0) ho_{1}{(U}_{2} rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{1}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta) = ho_{2}\left( U_{2} rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial x} + rac{\partial{\Phi_{2}}^{'}}{\partial t} + g\zeta ight)\quad(z = 0)ρ1​(U2​∂x∂Φ1​′​+∂t∂Φ1​′​+gζ)=ρ2​(U2​∂x∂Φ2​′​+∂t∂Φ2​′​+gζ)(z=0)

得到特征值关系：

ρ1{k~g+(s+ikU1)2}=ρ2{k~g−(s+ikU2)2} ho_{1}\left\{ \widetilde{k}g + \left( s + ikU_{1} ight)^{2} ight\} = ho_{2}\{\widetilde{k}g - {(s + ikU_{2})}^{2}\}ρ1​{kg+(s+ikU1​)2}=ρ2​{kg−(s+ikU2​)2}

解出s

s=−ikρ1U1+ρ2U2ρ1−ρ2±{k2ρ1ρ2(U1−U2)2(ρ1+ρ2)2−k~g(ρ1−ρ2)ρ1+ρ2}1/2s = - ik rac{ ho_{1}U_{1} + ho_{2}U_{2}}{ ho_{1} - ho_{2}} \pm \{ rac{k^{2} ho_{1} ho_{2}\left( U_{1} - U_{2} ight)^{2}}{\left( ho_{1} + ho_{2} ight)^{2}} - rac{\widetilde{k}g( ho_{1} - ho_{2})}{ ho_{1} + ho_{2}}\}^{1/2}s=−ikρ1​−ρ2​ρ1​U1​+ρ2​U2​​±{(ρ1​+ρ2​)2k2ρ1​ρ2​(U1​−U2​)2​−ρ1​+ρ2​kg(ρ1​−ρ2​)​}1/2

取U1=U2=0U_{1} = U_{2} = 0U1​=U2​=0
设系统以加速度作垂直方向的运动，并设向上为正，那么净加速度：

g′=g+fg^{'} = g + fg′=g+f

可得

s=±{k~g′(ρ1−ρ2)ρ1+ρ2}1/2s = \pm \{ rac{\widetilde{k}g^{'}( ho_{1} - ho_{2})}{ ho_{1} + ho_{2}}\}^{1/2}s=±{ρ1​+ρ2​kg′(ρ1​−ρ2​)​}1/2

当g′(ρ1−ρ2)>0g^{'}\left( ho_{1} - ho_{2} ight) > 0g′(ρ1​−ρ2​)>0时不稳定（也就是说重流体在轻流体"上方"时不稳定）

在球坐标系(r,θ,φ)中,交界面位于r=R处：

因此在中心附近邻域：

v=v0Tv = v_{0}Tv=v0​T

ZZ0=K(V)K(V0)VV0 rac{Z}{Z_{0}} = rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})} rac{V}{V_{0}}Z0​Z​=K(V0​)K(V)​V0​V​

代入到

dVdT=VK(V)Z rac{dV}{dT} = rac{VK(V)}{Z}dTdV​=ZVK(V)​

可以得到

dVdT=VK(V)Z0K(V)K(V0)VV0 rac{dV}{dT} = rac{VK(V)}{Z_{0} rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})} rac{V}{V_{0}}}dTdV​=Z0​K(V0​)K(V)​V0​V​VK(V)​

V=K(V0)V0Z0T+CV = rac{K(V_{0})V_{0}}{Z_{0}}T + CV=Z0​K(V0​)V0​​T+C

初始条件：

T=1时，Z=Z0，V=V0Z = Z_{0}，V = V_{0}Z=Z0​，V=V0​

V0=K(V0)V0Z0+CV_{0} = rac{K(V_{0})V_{0}}{Z_{0}} + CV0​=Z0​K(V0​)V0​​+C

C=V0−K(V0)V0Z0C = V_{0} - rac{K(V_{0})V_{0}}{Z_{0}}C=V0​−Z0​K(V0​)V0​​

V=K(V0)V0Z0T+V0−K(V0)V0Z0V = rac{K\left( V_{0} ight)V_{0}}{Z_{0}}T + V_{0} - rac{K\left( V_{0} ight)V_{0}}{Z_{0}}V=Z0​K(V0​)V0​​T+V0​−Z0​K(V0​)V0​​

V=K(V0)V0(T−1)Z0+V0V = rac{K\left( V_{0} ight)V_{0}(T - 1)}{Z_{0}} + V_{0}V=Z0​K(V0​)V0​(T−1)​+V0​

VV0=K(V0)(T−1)Z0+1 rac{V}{V_{0}} = rac{K\left( V_{0} ight)(T - 1)}{Z_{0}} + 1V0​V​=Z0​K(V0​)(T−1)​+1

ZZ0=K(V)K(V0)VV0=K(V)K(V0)(K(V0)(T−1)Z0+1) rac{Z}{Z_{0}} = rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})} rac{V}{V_{0}} = rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})}( rac{K\left( V_{0} ight)(T - 1)}{Z_{0}} + 1)Z0​Z​=K(V0​)K(V)​V0​V​=K(V0​)K(V)​(Z0​K(V0​)(T−1)​+1)

特殊条件下的解

假设最初自由表面完全平坦：

z0(r0)=0,Z0(r0)=1z_{0}(r_{0}) = 0,Z_{0}(r_{0}) = 1z0​(r0​)=0,Z0​(r0​)=1

代入得

VV0=K(V0)(T−1)+1 rac{V}{V_{0}} = K\left( V_{0} ight)(T - 1) + 1V0​V​=K(V0​)(T−1)+1

因为

K(V)=2J1(V)VK(V) = rac{2J_{1}(\sqrt{V})}{\sqrt{V}}K(V)=V​2J1​(V​)​

J1(x)x=12−x216+x4384+… rac{J_{1}(x)}{x} = rac{1}{2} - rac{x^{2}}{16} + rac{x^{4}}{384} + \ldotsxJ1​(x)​=21​−16x2​+384x4​+…

所以可以认为

lim⁡V→0K(V)=1−V8\lim_{V ightarrow 0}{K(V)} = 1 - rac{V}{8}V→0lim​K(V)=1−8V​

即

K(V0)=1K\left( V_{0} ight) = 1K(V0​)=1

VV0=(T−1)+1 rac{V}{V_{0}} = (T - 1) + 1V0​V​=(T−1)+1

V=V0TV = V_{0}TV=V0​T

ZZ0=K(V)K(V0)VV0=K(V)K(V0)(K(V0)(T−1)Z0+1) rac{Z}{Z_{0}} = rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})} rac{V}{V_{0}} = rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})}( rac{K\left( V_{0} ight)(T - 1)}{Z_{0}} + 1)Z0​Z​=K(V0​)K(V)​V0​V​=K(V0​)K(V)​(Z0​K(V0​)(T−1)​+1)

ZZ0=K(V)K(V0)(K(V0)(T−1)+1) rac{Z}{Z_{0}} = rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})}(K\left( V_{0} ight)(T - 1) + 1)Z0​Z​=K(V0​)K(V)​(K(V0​)(T−1)+1)

又因为在一阶邻域内可以忽略高阶项

lim⁡V→0K(V)=1−V8\lim_{V ightarrow 0}{K(V)} = 1 - rac{V}{8}V→0lim​K(V)=1−8V​

Z0=1Z_{0} = 1Z0​=1

可以得到

VV0=(T−1)K(V0)+1 rac{V}{V_{0}} = (T - 1)K\left( V_{0} ight) + 1V0​V​=(T−1)K(V0​)+1

Z=K(V)K(V0)(K(V0)(T−1)+1)Z = rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})}(K\left( V_{0} ight)(T - 1) + 1)Z=K(V0​)K(V)​(K(V0​)(T−1)+1)

因为

lim⁡x→011−x=1+x\lim_{x ightarrow 0} rac{1}{1 - x} = 1 + xx→0lim​1−x1​=1+x

可得

lim⁡V→01K(V)=1+V8\lim_{V ightarrow 0} rac{1}{K(V)} = 1 + rac{V}{8}V→0lim​K(V)1​=1+8V​

故

VV0=(T−1)(1−V08)+1 rac{V}{V_{0}} = (T - 1)(1 - rac{V_{0}}{8}) + 1V0​V​=(T−1)(1−8V0​​)+1

VV0=T−V08(T−1) rac{V}{V_{0}} = T - rac{V_{0}}{8}(T - 1)V0​V​=T−8V0​​(T−1)

V=V0T−V028(T−1)≈V0TV = V_{0}T - rac{V_{0}^{2}}{8}(T - 1) \approx V_{0}TV=V0​T−8V02​​(T−1)≈V0​T

同理

Z=K(V)K(V0)[(T−1)K(V0)+1]=K(V)(T−1)+K(V)K(V0)=K(V)(T−1)+K(V)(1+V08)=K(V)(T+V08)=K(V)(T+V8T)=(1−V8)(T+V8T)=T(1−V8)(1+V8T2)=T[1−V8−1T2−V2641T2]≈T[1−V8(1−1T2)]=T[1−V8(1−T−2)] egin{aligned}Z &= rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})}\lbrack(T - 1)K(V_{0}) + 1 brack\ &= K(V)(T - 1) + rac{K(V)}{K(V_{0})}\ &= K(V)(T - 1) + K(V)(1 + rac{V_{0}}{8})\ &= K(V)(T + rac{V_{0}}{8})\ &= K(V)(T + rac{V}{8T})\ &= (1 - rac{V}{8})(T + rac{V}{8T}) = T(1 - rac{V}{8})(1 + rac{V}{8T^{2}}) \&=T\left [ 1 - rac{V}{8} - rac{1}{T^{2}}- rac{V^{2}}{64} rac{1}{T^{2}} ight ]\ &\approx T\lbrack 1 - rac{V}{8}(1 - rac{1}{T^{2}}) brack \&= T\lbrack 1 - rac{V}{8}(1 - T^{- 2}) brack\end{aligned}Z​=K(V0​)K(V)​[(T−1)K(V0​)+1]=K(V)(T−1)+K(V0​)K(V)​=K(V)(T−1)+K(V)(1+8V0​​)=K(V)(T+8V0​​)=K(V)(T+8TV​)=(1−8V​)(T+8TV​)=T(1−8V​)(1+8T2V​)=T[1−8V​−T21​−64V2​T21​]≈T[1−8V​(1−T21​)]=T[1−8V​(1−T−2)]​

下面为了方便表示

记

u=−V8(1−T−2)u = - rac{V}{8}(1 - T^{- 2})u=−8V​(1−T−2)

再利用

ln(1+x)≈xln(1 + x) \approx xln(1+x)≈x

可得到

z=ln⁡Z≈lnT[1−V8(1−T−2)]=lnT(1+u)=lnT+ln(1+u)≈lnT+u egin{aligned} z& = \ln Z \&\approx lnT\left [ 1 - rac{V}{8}(1 - T^{- 2}) ight ] \ &= lnT(1 + u) \ &= lnT + ln(1 + u) \ &\approx lnT + u \end{aligned}z​=lnZ≈lnT[1−8V​(1−T−2)]=lnT(1+u)=lnT+ln(1+u)≈lnT+u​

e−z=1T(1+u)=1T(1−u){e}^{-z}= rac{1}{T(1 + u)}{=} rac{1}{T}(1 - u)e−z=T(1+u)1​=T1​(1−u)

e−2z=1T2(1+u)2=1T2(1−2u)e^{-2z}= rac{1}{T^{2} (1+u) ^{2}}= rac{1}{T^{2}} ( 1-2u ) e−2z=T2(1+u)21​=T21​(1−2u)

Φt=1T(1−u)(1−v4)d2Tdt2\Phi_{t}= rac{1}{T}(1 - u)(1 - rac{v}{4}) rac{d^{2}T}{dt^{2}}Φt​=T1​(1−u)(1−4v​)dt2d2T​

Φz2=1T2(1−2u)(1−v2)(dTdt)2{\Phi_{z}}^{2}= rac{1}{T^{2}}(1 - 2u)(1 - rac{v}{2})( rac{dT}{dt})^{2}Φz​2=T21​(1−2u)(1−2v​)(dtdT​)2

Φr2=1T2(1−2u)(1−v2)v4(dTdt)2\Phi_{r}^{2}= rac{1}{T^{2}}(1 - 2u)(1 - rac{v}{2}) rac{v}{4}( rac{dT}{dt})^{2}Φr2​=T21​(1−2u)(1−2v​)4v​(dtdT​)2

因此伯努利方程里v的系数为

d2Tdt2(−14)+(−1)T(T−2−1)+8d2Tdt2+(−12)−2T2T−2−18(dTdt2)+(−12)1T2(dTdt)2(−12)+(−12)1T2(dTdt)214+(−1)T−2−18≡0 rac{d^{2}T}{dt^{2}}\left( - rac{1}{4} ight) + rac{\left( - 1 ight)}{T} rac{\left( T^{- 2} - 1 ight)}+{8} rac{d^{2}T}{dt^{2}}+ (- rac{1}{2}) rac{-2}{T^{2}} rac{T^{-2}-1}{8}( rac{dT}{dt}^{2})+ (- rac{1}{2}) rac{1}{T^{2}}( rac{dT}{dt})^{2}(- rac{1}{2})+ (- rac{1}{2}) rac{1}{T^{2}}( rac{dT}{dt})^{2} rac{1}{4}+ (-1) rac{T^{-2}-1}{8} \equiv0dt2d2T​(−41​)+T(−1)​+(T−2−1)​8dt2d2T​+(−21​)T2−2​8T−2−1​(dtdT​2)+(−21​)T21​(dtdT​)2(−21​)+(−21​)T21​(dtdT​)241​+(−1)8T−2−1​≡0

化简后

T(T2+1)d2Tdt2+(dTdt)2−T2(T2−1)=0T(T^{2}+ 1) rac{d^{2}{T}}{dt^{2}} + \left( rac{dT}{dt} ight)^{2} - T^{2}\left( T^{2} - 1 ight) = 0T(T2+1)dt2d2T​+(dtdT​)2−T2(T2−1)=0
